name: It's a Waste of Human Life!

trigger.text: Place all cost 2 or less characters on the bottom of their owner's decks.

text: Main: Place all cost 3 or lower characters on the bottom of their owner's decks. Then, until there are 5 cards in each players' hands, discard cards.

effect.text: Place all cost 3 or lower characters on the bottom of their owner's decks. Then, until there are 5 cards in each players' hands, discard cards.
Place all cost 2 or less characters on the bottom of their owner's decks.
